premise_source_doc_sentence: Also , this prime Meridian Line  (  0 ° 00 ' 00.00 '' E/W  )  passes through the center of Meridian Port Services Container Terminal , the line first enters MPS from the northern boundary  (  5 ° 37 ' 35.15 '' N  )  to the beach side  (  5 ° 37 ' 29.75 '' N  )  which is the closes point on Earth to the Center of the World where the Greenwich Meridian Line  (  zero degrees longitude  )  crosses with the Equator Line  (  zero degrees latitude  )  .
